html:
For the first time since 2019, Peter Bjorn and John will be performing in North America. The shows take place in May, and they’ll mark the 19th anniversary of the Swedish indie trio’s beloved 2006 album, Writer’s Block. See Peter Bjorn and John’s tour dates below.

Writer’s Block was the first Peter Bjorn and John album to chart on the Billboard 200. It features some of the group’s best-known songs, including “Young Folks” and “Let’s Call It Off.”

Peter Bjorn and John released their latest studio album, Endless Dream, in March 2020.
